109 void getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(geometry_msgs::Quaternion orientation, double& roll,double& pitch, double& yaw)
110 {
111  tf::Quaternion quat;
112  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(orientation,quat);
113  quat.normalize();
114  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(quat);
115  mat.getRPY(roll, pitch,yaw);
116 
117  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Quaternion is : " << quat.x() << " " << quat.y() << " " << quat.z() << " " << quat.w());
118  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Converted R: " << roll << " P: " << pitch << " Y: " << yaw);
119 }
120 
121 void printRoll(std::string text)
122 {
123  ros::spinOnce();
124  lock_pose.lock();
125  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped initial_pose=current_pose;
126  lock_pose.unlock();
127 
128  double r,p,y;
129  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(initial_pose.pose.orientation,r,p,y);
130  lower_angle_thresh = r;
131  ROS_INFO_STREAM(text << angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh));
132 }
133 
134 void printPitch(std::string text)
135 {
136  ros::spinOnce();
137  lock_pose.lock();
138  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped initial_pose=current_pose;
139  lock_pose.unlock();
140 
141  double r,p,y;
142  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(initial_pose.pose.orientation,r,p,y);
143  lower_angle_thresh = p;
144  ROS_INFO_STREAM(text << angles::to_degrees(lower_angle_thresh));
145 }

148 void printRPYCurrent(std::string text)
149 {
150  ros::spinOnce();
151  lock_pose.lock();
152  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped initial_pose=current_pose;
153  lock_pose.unlock();
154 
155  double r,p,y;
156  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(initial_pose.pose.orientation,r,p,y);
157 
158  ROS_INFO_STREAM(text << " R: " << angles::to_degrees(r)
159  << " P: " << angles::to_degrees(p)
160  << " Y: " << angles::to_degrees(y));
161 }

163 void printRPY(std::string text, double roll, double pitch, double yaw)
164 {
165  ROS_INFO_STREAM(text << " R: " << angles::to_degrees(roll)
166  << " P: " << angles::to_degrees(pitch)
167  << " Y: " << angles::to_degrees(yaw));
168 }

171 void poseGrabber(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose)
172 {
173  pose_lock.lock();
174  current_pose = pose;
175  pose_lock.unlock();
176  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Got current pose as x=" << pose << " saved as " << current_pose);
177 }

180 void publishTwistForDuration(geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg, double duration)
181 {
182  ros::Time time_start = ros::Time::now();
183  while (ros::Time::now() - time_start < ros::Duration(duration))
184  {
185  ros::spinOnce();
186  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
187  }
188 }
189 
190 void driveToRollGoalWithVelocity(int direction)
191 {
192  if(direction == RAISE_CUP)
193  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Raise cup");
194  else if (direction == LOWER_CUP)
195  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Lower cup");
196  else
197  {
198  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Wrong direction given!!");
199  return;
200  }
201 
202  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, goal_pose, temp_pose;
203 
204  lock_pose.lock();
205  start_pose=current_pose;
206  lock_pose.unlock();
207 
208  double temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw;
209  double goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw;
210  double start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw;
211  double del_rol;
212 
213  goal_pose = start_pose;
214 
215  tf::Quaternion q_rot = tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(angles::from_degrees( direction==RAISE_CUP?ROTATION_STEP:-ROTATION_STEP),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0)); // Rotate about x by 20 degrees
216  tf::Quaternion q_start; tf::quaternionMsgToTF(start_pose.pose.orientation, q_start);
217  tf::Quaternion q_goal = q_start*q_rot;
218 
219  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_goal,goal_pose.pose.orientation);
220 
221 
222  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
223  //ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
224  while(ros::ok())
225  {
226  ros::spinOnce();
227  lock_pose.lock();
228  temp_pose = current_pose;
229  lock_pose.unlock();
230 
231  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(goal_pose.pose.orientation, goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw);
232  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw);
233  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(start_pose.pose.orientation, start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw);
234 
235  if (goal_rol < 0 ) goal_rol = goal_rol + angles::from_degrees(360);
236  if (temp_rol < 0 ) temp_rol = temp_rol + angles::from_degrees(360);
237 
238  del_rol = goal_rol - temp_rol;
239 
240  if (std::fabs(del_rol)>=thresh_ang)
241  {
242  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg;
243  twist_msg.twist.linear.x = 0;
244  twist_msg.twist.linear.y = 0;
245  twist_msg.twist.linear.z = 0;
246  twist_msg.twist.angular.x= del_rol>0?VEL_ANG_MAX:-VEL_ANG_MAX;
247  twist_msg.twist.angular.y = 0;
248  twist_msg.twist.angular.z= 0;
249 
250  ROS_INFO_STREAM("goal_rol: " << angles::to_degrees(goal_rol) << " temp_rol : " << angles::to_degrees(temp_rol) << " del_rol: " << del_rol);
251  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
252  }
253  else
254  {
255  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Roll: " << angles::to_degrees(temp_rol) << " Delta: " << del_rol << " Goal reached, breaking loop");
256  break;
257  }
258 
259  ros::spinOnce();
260  loop_rate.sleep();
261  }
262 
263 }
264 
265 void driveToPitchGoalWithVelocity(int direction)
266 {
267  if(direction == RAISE_CUP)
268  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Raise Cup");
269  else if (direction == LOWER_CUP)
270  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Lower Cup");
271  else
272  {
273  ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Wrong direction given!!");
274  return;
275  }
276 
277  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, goal_pose, temp_pose;
278 
279  lock_pose.lock();
280  start_pose=current_pose;
281  lock_pose.unlock();
282 
283  double temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw;
284  double goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw;
285  double start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw;
286  double del_pitch;
287 
288  goal_pose = start_pose;
289 
290  tf::Quaternion q_rot = tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees( direction==RAISE_CUP?-ROTATION_STEP:ROTATION_STEP)); // Change Pitch angle
291  tf::Quaternion q_start; tf::quaternionMsgToTF(start_pose.pose.orientation, q_start);
292  tf::Quaternion q_goal = q_start*q_rot;
293 
294  tf::quaternionTFToMsg(q_goal,goal_pose.pose.orientation);
295 
296  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
297  //ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
298  while(ros::ok())
299  {
300  lock_pose.lock();
301  temp_pose = current_pose;
302  lock_pose.unlock();
303 
304  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(goal_pose.pose.orientation, goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw);
305  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(temp_pose.pose.orientation, temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw);
306  getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(start_pose.pose.orientation, start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw);
307 
308  printRPY("goal", goal_rol, goal_pit, goal_yaw);
309  printRPY("temp", temp_rol, temp_pit, temp_yaw);
310  printRPY("start", start_rol, start_pit, start_yaw);
311 
312  del_pitch = goal_pit - temp_pit;
313  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Goal_P: " << angles::to_degrees(goal_pit) << " Temp_P: " << angles::to_degrees(temp_pit) << " Del_P: " << del_pitch << " Thresh_A: " << thresh_ang);
314 
315  if (std::fabs(del_pitch)>=thresh_ang)
316  {
317  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Publishing velocity command");
318  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped twist_msg;
319  twist_msg.twist.linear.x = 0;
320  twist_msg.twist.linear.y = 0;
321  // Comment out next line ONLY if using end-effector mode ie: Mode 1 on jostick is active and 4th blue LED on far right is active.
322 // twist_msg.twist.linear.z = direction == LOWER_CUP? -thresh_lin : thresh_lin;
323  twist_msg.twist.angular.x = 0;
324  twist_msg.twist.angular.z= del_pitch>0?-VEL_ANG_MAX:VEL_ANG_MAX;
325  twist_msg.twist.angular.y= 0;
326 
327  cmd_vel.publish(twist_msg);
328 
329  }
330  else
331  {
332  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Goal reached, breaking loop");
333  break;
334  }
335 
336  ros::spinOnce();
337  loop_rate.sleep();
338  }
339 
340 }

345 
346 int main(int argc, char **argv)
347 {
348  ros::init(argc, argv, "velocity_drive");
349  ros::NodeHandle nh;
350 
351  //ros::Publisher cmd_vel = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>("/RobotControl/VelocityControl", 1000);
352  cmd_vel = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>("/RobotControl/VelocityControl", 1000);
353  pub_kinova_vel = nh.advertise<kinova_msgs::PoseVelocity>("/j2s7s300_driver/in/cartesian_velocity", 1000);
354  ros::Subscriber tool_pose = nh.subscribe("/j2s7s300_driver/out/tool_pose",1000, poseGrabber );
355 
356  ros::Rate loop_rate(100);
357  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
358 
359  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped vel_msg;
360 
361 
362  // This loop to wait until subscriber starts returning valid poses.
363  while(ros::ok())
364  {
365  pose_lock.lock();
366  temp_pose = current_pose;
367  pose_lock.unlock();
368  ros::spinOnce();
369  loop_rate.sleep();
370  if (temp_pose.pose.position.x > 0) break;
371  }
372 
373  ROS_INFO("Valid pose available");
374 
375  printPitch("Pitch before change ");
376  driveToPitchGoalWithVelocity(LOWER_CUP);
377  printPitch("Pitch after change, pre pause ");
378 // sleep(1.0);
379 // printPitch("Pitch after change, post pause ");
380 
381 
382 
383 
384  ros::spinOnce();
385  return 0;
386 }
